name: ted-eu-tender-search
title: TED.EU Tender Search & Monitor
description: Search and monitor European public procurement tenders from TED.EU with customizable filtering, relevance scoring, and multi-format outputs. Perfect for businesses, consultants, and researchers tracking EU opportunities.
seoTitle: TED.EU Tender Search - European Procurement Opportunities
seoDescription: Automated search and monitoring of European public procurement tenders with custom filtering, relevance scoring, and real-time data from TED.EU database.

dataset.title: TED Tender Results
dataset.description: Filtered and scored tender opportunities from TED.EU
